post.body: - Impress them by showing, with evidence, why SEO just doesn't matter anymore. They should be looking at direct adverts online.
- SEO is sooooo Web 1.0
- Don't get too worked up. Remember: it's still a beta.
- my point still stands. Unaustralian. Also, i'd say having no money to spend on Britney tickets is a good thing.
- The All Blacks?? UnAustralian.
- Exactly. Improve your chances of finding another job by helping the economy. Spend Spend Spend!
- Keepin' it real. It's what I'm here for.
- no brainer. Sell it.
- Oh well. we've all fallen asleep on a train at least once in our lives. Hopefully it doesn't mean your late for something.
- thanks Santa!
- getting you laptop fixed?
- It's about 7 colds? On a scale of 1 to Mammoth
- midnight snack?
- awesome.
- "No...Kate doesn't have a drinking problem. Why do you ask?"
- Could you? It's getting a little too warm again.
- Dear god. We're all doomed.
- TV Chefs: Uncut (?)
- Two words: Epic. Fail.
- Doesn't suprise me. Most tech's don't bother cloning the hard drive before they start. Stupid, I know.
- I might pass that thought onto my boss....
- Twittlelator, Facebook and a weather radar for Australia.
- Even better!
- going to CES?
- STFU you.
- It's a million degrees here again today. I'd love to get cycling again, but where I live is stupidly hilly.
- It's called "humanity" mate. Generally they tend to be brain-dead imbeciles.
-tiwwter, twatter, twiiter, ywittrr among others.
- they did that to me the other day. They said 20 minutes, took closer to 90 and another phocall. They're bloody hopeless.
- Yes please. It's 60million degrees here today.
G'night Twitterverse.
Bernie The Bolt, Casual Consultant - http://tinyurl.com/5btj8v
I think I'm turning into a casual IT consultant. Help.
Urgh. Can't the office close for the year already. I don't want to go to work anymore.
FFS! It's the first of December and every female in the house has gone completely insane over it being Christmas. It's horrible.
...or it could be me. Don't leave USB drives plugged in when you reboot. Oops. Apologies old server.
Hmmm. I think our old server is on the fritz. It just failed to boot. Thankfully it's not mission critical anymore.
Vantage Point is a stupid movie. I've been watching for an hour and the plot has barely progressed. Good night Twitterverse.
Urgh. I'm bored and tired. I don't think I will see the end of this movie.
Currently laying downstairs watching the cricket. Enjoying a lazy Sunday afternoon.
Just finished playing through Call of Duty 4 again. I forget just how brilliant that game is sometimes.
My god. I just realised how much data Google has on me. That's just outright scary.
I'm the only one home at the moment. Time to turn the music up to 11.
I am not well.
Fuck you Rockstar. Fuck you.
Server reboot. Hang on to your hats kids.
0930: server still tits up. Doing anything on the network is painstakingly slow. Where's the IT man??
heh, server problems have no spread to the whole office. Everyone's slowly grinding to a halt as the machines stop talking to each other.
It would appear that a hard drive has failed in our server this morning...and the beeping noise it makes is driving us INSANE. HELP.
Hooray! Should be getting GTA:IV and Quantum of Solace fir my PC on the mail today. Nice end of week gaming session coming up on Friday.
The admin bitch is BACK
mmmmm....Sweet Chilli Bun for morning tea. Love Fridays at the office.
Anyone know why AutoCAD has decided to be a complete fucktard this week? It's really giving me the shits with it's bogginess.
Hooray, it's Friday! I wonder if I'm going to have to do more Admin Bitch today?
Sleepy now.
Wow. So I've got GTA4 to a playable state...but it's burning up Arnie. I'm scared the things going to melt or something.
Currently playing receptionist at work. The falsetto is killing my voice and the skirt just doesn't look good. I also have no tits.
Dammit. I hate summer. I can't sleep
early night for me I think. I'm rather tired.
"Stop eating my sesame cake!" lovin @the404
I can't decide what's nerdier. Picking the special reletivity joke, or googling it just to be certain. I hate you XKCD.
I want a new computer (i7, yum..). But also want to go on holidays. Urgh. Anyone want to donate to the Make Matt Rich Foundation?
The erganomics of this temporary desk are horrible. My neck is killing me.
Working at Douglas Partners today. It's quiet and cold here.
OK. It's decided. Work computer is going to suffer a painful death. Time to format and rebuild.
YAY! Back at my proper desk. It's nice to be home. Now, to get AutoCAD working properly again without rebuilding the entire machine...
There's still one thing that bugs me about the iPhone: the inability to create custom SMS and email tones.
Downstairs used to be a quite, isolated area where I could get away from my family. FFS, I'm glad I don't want to go to bed yet. Not a hope
Help. This job just got eleventy-million times more complicated.
Decided to take a "Pop" trip to Sydney on Saturday. Catch the train down and spend the day meandering around the big smoke. Should be fun.
I'm seriously in need of a weekend. Not that it's going to be quiet. Dinks tonight, Sydney Saturday then Work Christmas party on Sunday.
Is it wrong to be siphoning every XKCD comic and hoarding them for use in a screensaver?
Hooray! Twhirl's back. Now I can send you all pointless messages again!
Hmm...twhirl appears not to want to authenticate my login. Help?
Nearly 1600hrs. Almost home time. Dammit, I didn't ring the travel agent. Oh well, I'll just turn up unannounced/
*yawn* Tired.
Arnie is quite warm at the moment. Unfortunately, it's not winter anymore.
Hehe, work computer formatted and is now being used by the work experience kid. Poor sod.
http://bernietb.wordpress.com/2008/12/10/holidays/ - Planned. Well...sort of.
Holidays - I want to go on them, not plan them
There's a few sore heads at the office this morning. Clearly these parties need to stop being on Sundays.
Urgh. Morning.
It's 0400, why am I awake?
Dammit. I'm on the wrong continant.
Booze bus inbound. What gave I got myself into?
Booze bus to the work christmas party arrives in a little over an hour. Should be entertaining.
Showered and feeling very refreshed. Currently now downloading today's photos to blog and the latest CARTFactor: Prologue build to test
Must. Not. Fall. Asleep. On. Train.
Getting back on a train to head home. A little earlier than planned, but i'm buggered.
http://twitpic.com/sarg - This is not art
http://twitpic.com/samh - Never taken this photo before. Probably never will again, but it has to done at least once in a life.
Apple Store in sydney is sterile and very uninviting. Don't think I'll be going back anytime soon. Also spotted Audi R8 in the wild.
Just arrived at Woy Woy on my way to Sydney this morning. Weather is still rather dreadful and the train full of loud children.
And more beer!
BEER!
Only three or four more blocks to go. My god, this is going to make someone a great deal of money...
Half-way through redesigning another 900 lot subdivision. Only 400/450 lots to go. Then it's the weekend.
Loving the beta of CART Factor. Brilliant stuff to drive.
Dammit, I'm turning into Dad. Just fell asleep on the lounge watching the cricket. Not that it was boring, I'm just completely stuffed.
Dad's got the remnants of his office christmas party here for further drinks/dinner. We all suck horribly at pool.
The IT Crowd is absolute gold.
Right, I really need to cut back how much I drink on the weekends. I swear I feel a little worse each time.
Puuuuuub!!
sweeeeet. Got the pricing for my holiday. Now to get it paid...and also get a passport.
4 work days until the office closes. Can't wait. Also going out for lunch with work on Friday, should be an easy afternoons work.
Redesigned 750 lot subdivision...again...I've lost count which version I'm up to on this job...I think there's not enough numbers
This cheap petrol thing rocks. I have never filled my car up for less than $75-$80. Today, $62. Recently it's been up over $100. Awesome
Right. ENOUGH OF ANDRE REIU. I don't care how good the man fiddles. I HAVE HAD ENOUGH
Here we go. Spotted in the wild in Sydney on Saturday: http://tinyurl.com/5jvppm
I was going to go to the travel agent this afternoon and book my holiday, but I'm so bloody tired I may just go home and sleep or something.
I've discovered that my brain isn't really in gear today. Might head home later and work from bed. Maybe.
Twitter and theRacingLine.net http://tinyurl.com/9cz6dm
Logitech and I have differing opinions on the definition of the word 'critical'. The mouse has had "critical" batteries for days now.
http://twitpic.com/1020p - Current home screen.
Urgh. Is it just me or is today really crawling along?
Thank Christ for air-conditioning. Today is supposed to be absolutely boiling - and I'm going to spend it in an office with no windows. Win
Just went for a walk on the treadmill. 3k's in 45 minutes and I'm completely fucked. Stark realisation of just how out of shape I am.
Tomorrow - Routines Old and New http://tinyurl.com/a8lvoz
Weather forecast for the week: Monday 33, Tuesday 36, Wednesday 37, Thursday 29. I hate summer.
Ha! Downloading stage 1 Dakar highlights and my internet connection is griding to a halt. I hate ADSL sometimes. I need more bandwidth.
Bloody hell. Australia actually look like they're going to post a decent total in the cricket. Here's hoping me get a decent match.
